price: Àwọn tó ń fẹ́ràn ìṣẹ̀mí ayé ju tọ̀run, tí wọ́n ń ṣẹ́rí àwọn ènìyàn kúrò lójú ọ̀nà (ẹ̀sìn) Allāhu, wọ́n sì ń fẹ́ kó wọ́; àwọn wọ̀nyẹn wà nínú ìṣìnà tó jìnnà.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَحِبُّونَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَبۡغُونَهَا عِوَجًاۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ضَلَٰلِۭ بَعِيدٖ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yastaḥibbūna al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wayaṣuddūna ʿan sabīli al-lahi wayabghūnahā ʿiwajan ulāika fī ḍalālin baʿīdin
